headline: Romney Rips Taylor Greene, Gosar’s Appearance on White Nationalist Conference: ‘I’ve Got Morons on My Team’
sentences: And Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar, I don't know them, but I'm reminded of that old line from the 'Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid' movie, where one character says, 'Morons, I have got morons on my team.'

‘Anybody who would sit down with white nationalists and speak at their conference were certainly missing a few IQ points’
EXCERPT:
ROMNEY: "Absolutely.
And I have to think anybody that would sit down with white nationalists and speak at their conference was certainly missing a few I.Q.
And I also saw that Ronna McDaniel came out with a statement as well talking about how repugnant these white nationalists are.
Look, there's no place in either political party for this white nationalism or racism.
Liz Cheney was right with that statement, and she's been right for a long time.
It's — it's — as you have indicated, speaking of evil, it's evil as well.
